host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les instances Azure App Service Plan via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure App Service Plan resources service using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure App Service Plan service using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Web-AppServicePlan

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin Pack to monitor Azure App Service Plan service using RestAPI or AZCLI.**

Available Host template and related Services:

|Cloud-Azure-Web-AppServicePlan-custom|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Data|
|Health|
|Memory|
|Socket|
|Tcp-Connections|

This Plugin-Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

**Plugin Pack pour superviser les ressources Azure App Service Plan via RestAPI ou AZCLI.**

Modèle d\'Hôte disponible et Services associés:

|Cloud-Azure-Web-AppServicePlan-custom|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Data|
|Health|
|Memory|
|Socket|
|Tcp-Connections|

Ce Plugin-Pack fournit un *provider* Host Discovery pour le module d\'auto-découverte d\'Hôtes

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module >= 19.10.1

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure App Service Plan
